sub_title: Senior Front-end Engineer / Front-end Team Lead
summary: A self-motivated Senior Front-end Engineer / Front-end Team Lead with 15+ years of developing and leading experience. Successfully developed a number of web projects, mobile applications, web-based databases, and applications for Set-top Boxes. Was responsible for negotiations with clients, concepting of projects, decision making on UX and UI, defining working stack, etc. Experienced to work in agile teams, able to properly plan, estimate, and control development processes. Have a good understanding of business processes and requirements.

courses.name: Marketing master class by Igor Mann

profile_positions.description:
I take care of all frontend work in our web application and mobile applications from converting requirements of product owner, defining workflows of users, and decision making on UI/UX, to the development of them. I was managing the development process of a third-party development company, wrote all the specifications required for it, planned sprints, and participated in the development at the same time. I also manage all the tech tools used by the company. 

Technologies used: 
JavaScript, React, Redux, React Native, Node.js, HTML5, CSS3 (SASS), Webpack, Git, Wordpress 

Activities: 
 - Writing specifications for new web app modules and Live tracking application
 - Leading and supporting a team of mobile developers
 - Defining tasks, priorities for the development process in Jira
 - Building a new Live tracking application
 - Testing and polishing all applications
 - Creating new web application in React stack
 - Supporting and updating existing modules of Angular web application
 - Supporting and updating an existing mobile application
 - Supporting Wordpress website
 - Interviewing candidates for the tech department
 - Taking care of all tech tool used in the company
 - Decision making on UX / UI (together with designers)

Projects: 
 - Angular Web App
 - React Web application
 - Players live tracking mobile application
 - Mobile RPE (Rated Perceived Exertion) application
 - Wordpress website
profile_positions.title: Senior Frontend Engineer

profile_positions.description:
The front-end team was involved in the development of two long-term projects (one internal and one external) and several short-term projects like small websites and apps. I had to manage priorities, team capacity, defining working stack, communicating with different clients and development teams as well as writing a lot of code.

Technologies used: 
JavaScript, Backbone, React, Redux, Vue.js, PHP (Laravel framework), Python, Node.js, HTML5, CSS3 (SASS), Gulp, Webpack, Git, Wordpress

Activities: 
 - Leading and supporting the front-end team
 - Built the most stable, bug-free project with the best code style between several development teams for our external client
 - Updating existing code to the latest JavaScript specifications
 - Introduced Webpack instead of Gulp as a front-end build environment
 - Introducing JS linters and code quality tools
 - Decision making on UX / UI (together with designers)

Projects: 
 - Soda - Survey tool for analyzing online marketing campaigns and building a new audience for clients
 - Pulse - Entertainment System for Super Yachts
profile_positions.title: Senior Developer
Web Developer

profile_positions.description:
The company is engaged in the development and maintenance of their own web portals. The main goal of the company - is to provide the necessary information to users of various areas in internet. Current projects: www.CityLife.az, www.Banks.az. 

I started to work in this company from the day of its establishment. My main goals at the beginning were to create professional team of developers and organize their work, write detailed technical assignment for all web projects. I was engaged in all projects development, management of developers’ team, setting up and maintaining web servers. All web projects were written on JavaScript, PHP, MySQL.
 
Properly organized work, good team and properly completed detailed technical documentation helped me successfully deliver the project and to create the first in Azerbaijan a major entertainment web site - Citylife.az, which now is the leader in this segment of the Internet in Azerbaijan, as well as project about banks’ products and services - Banks.az.

Activities: 
•	Participation in web projects’ concepts preparation
•	Creation of technical documentation for projects 
•	Management of developers’  team of 4 people;
•	Prioritizing, planning, coordinating, and supervising of all activities related to the design, development and testing; 
•	Development of projects (JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, HTML5, CSS3)
•	Setting up and maintaining internal and external web servers for projects (Apache, MySQL, PHP, Cpanel, ISP Manager)
profile_positions.title: Lead Web Developer

profile_positions.description:
Digital Stream is the company, the main direction of which is the creation and support of web sites for small and medium businesses.

My responsibilities included meetings with customers, preparation and discussion of technical specifications. I had to manage a group of developers and web masters, so that all work would be carried out with a high quality, within deadlines and met all standards of programming and coding. Despite of some administrative responsibilities, I was main PHP programmer in our company and had a lot of development work. 

Activities: 
•	Development of the entire websites, modules for already developed web sites, CMSs, web based databases.  Technologies used: JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, SSL, XML, RSS 
•	Testing and verification of developed project. 
•	Managing web developers and web masters groups
•	Holding meetings with clients to identify requirements for the projects
•	Preparation and further modifications of technical specifications 
•	Involved in HTML,CCS coding if needed.
profile_positions.title: Senior Web Developer

profile_positions.description:
I met with customers to understand their needs and then prepared the technical assignment. After confirmation of it, I was working on algorithm of Content Management System (CMS) and developed it using PHP (programming language) and MySQL (database). I participated in writhing HTML and CSS codes. After testing and the necessary corrections, I inserted the information to the website. 

Activities: 
•	Preparation and development of technical specifications based on the customer requirements 
•	WEB User Interface coding from creative graphic design to HTML, CSS (W3C standards)
•	Java Script coding
•	Creating different Content Management Systems (CMS) using following technologies (PHP, MySQL, SSL, XML, RSS)
•	Testing and verification of developed project
profile_positions.title: Web Programmer / Web master

profile_positions.description:
I was engaged in the assembly and repair of computer hardware, software installation, wiring LAN, telephone and electric cables, maintenance of servers. My main job held on onshore production facilities and at the offices of British Petrolium contractors according to company HSE regulations.

Activities: 
•	Repairing and assembly of IT equipment (laptops, printers, desktop computers)
•	Installation of operation system and other programs (Windows 2000/XP, Microsoft Office, etc.)
•	Maintenance of corporate servers (Windows NT, 2003 Server, Microsoft Exchange, MDaemon)
•	Installation and testing of cabling products (UTP / FTP / STP CUT1, CUT2, CUT5) in accordance with the manufacturer's specifications and industry standards (100BASE-T, 1000BASE-T, etc.)
profile_positions.title: IT Specialist / Network Administrator

profile_positions.description:
My task was to write HTML and CSS code based on the previously painted web site design using W3C standards
 
Activities:

profile_positions.title: Web Master

profile_positions.description:
I was responsible for the correct sorting of documents, entering data from documents into the database. There is extreme care rrequired because most of the documents were in one piece.
 
Activities: 
•	Sort documents (hard copies)
•	Analizing data from documents
•	Inserting analized date to specialial database programm
•	Verifying the information entered previously
